whatIsTRY.title: What is TRY?
whatIsTRY.intro: This tool is a helping hand in letting go of your eating disorder and finding the real you.

track.heading: Track:
track.body: Add a picture, location, the company you were with, your emotions and behaviour. This app is web-based and your entries will be stored in your browser even if you do not have an account.

export.heading: Export:
export.body: Choose which entries you want to export and download your overview in PDF format.

anytimeAnywhere.heading: Anytime and anywhere:
anytimeAnywhere.body: You can create an account with Google if you want to access your data from anywhere.

improve.heading: Improve:
improve.body: If you feel you are missing a feature you can let us know. We value feedback on how to improve this app.

share.heading: Share:
share.body: Recommend or share this app with someone you think might benefit from it, or because it helped you out.

workingOn.title: What TRY is still working on?
workingOn.intro: Our aim is to keep it simple, but there are some new features and improvements that we will keep implementing over time.

copingSkills.heading: Coping skills:
copingSkills.body: Having an off day or need some inspiration to get out of your own head? We will be adding tips pages and a meditation tool.

flagsFilters.heading: Flags and filters:
flagsFilters.body: Flag a moment so you can discuss it later with your physician.

notifications.heading: Notifications:
notifications.body: Want a friendly reminder to track your lunch? Maybe a weekly summary of your progress?

buddies.heading: Buddies:
buddies.body: With flags and filters in place, you can connect a buddy (likely your physician, but it can be anyone you grant access). Your buddy can respond to your moments with messages, and you can ask for help directly.

statistics.heading: Statistics:
statistics.body: See an overview of good and bad days, with graphs that show your progress toward your goals.

epiphanies.heading: Epiphanies:
epiphanies.body: Alongside motivational quotes, your own healing thoughts can become part of your journey. Think yours might help others? Make them public.

customization.heading: Customization:
customization.body: Would it not be helpful if you could add your own locations and company?
